title: About Love, Hate and the other ones v0.1.5 (Samsung Apps)
description:
1 million players on iPhone and iPad, finally available for your Samsung!

Slip into the role of Love and Hate in this fun and challenging puzzle game. Help the cute main characters to get back to their beloved hill. 

Master all of the 90 levels, encounter diverse other ones and find out how they respond to Love and Hate.

The game features easy to learn touch controls, specifically designed for the your Samsung device. Lovely music and sounds, all tailor-made for the game.

- unique graphics
- outstanding music and sounds
